Sunshine Festival at The Gorge

August 20-21, 2023

Celebrate music and art with us at Lewiston's Amphitheatre this summer! Enjoy a diverse lineup of musical performances, stunning visual art exhibits, and delicious food and drinks in a beautiful outdoor setting.

Get Tickets

The Sunshine Festival

The Sunshine Festival is an annual downtown event celebrating local music, food, and culture with live performances, crafts, games, and a lively parade. Join us for a fun-filled day of community spirit and sunshine!
